title.narrative: Main contract - Results, Evidence and Knowledge from the International Climate Fund

description.narrative: This activity (Main contract - Results, Evidence and Knowledge from the International Climate Fund) is a component of Monitoring , Evaluation and Learning from the International Climate Fund reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £7,151,757. This component benefits Developing countries, unspecified, and works in the following sector(s): Environmental policy and administrative management. , with the following implementing partners: IMC Worldwide, IOD PARC, LEAD International. The start date is 01-06-2014 and the end date is 31-08-2020.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

description.narrative: Environment - Water, Natural Resource Management and Environment - Environment - policy, planning and administration
